Class Controller

java.lang.Object
tme3.Controller

Abstract Class that represents controller.

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(String eventName, long delayTime, int ring, Controller controller)
      Create Bell Event that has an extra parameter, ring and add Event to the eventList and call addEvent(Event c) to start the event
      Parameters:
      eventName - Name of the event
      delayTime - Delay time of the Event
      ring - Number of rings for Bell event
      controller - Controller of the Event
